node.title: How to Find Bible-Hungry People
node.description: “There are men and women everywhere whose hearts are susceptible of being inspired with the truth.” (3T 64). This statement is as true today as when it was written. How can we find these people? And how can we communicate with them in a genuine way? This seminar focuses on personal social skills in evangelism and gives practical tips of how to be an effective soul-winner without spending a single krona.
